name: .VCRD File Extension
summary: Learn about .VCRD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Windows Vault, a security program introduced with Windows 7 that can store user names and passwords for Windows users; contains the users credentials (passwords, etc.) in an encrypted format; requires an associated schema file (.VSCH) and policy file (.VPOL) in order for user credentials to be verified.

content: VCRD files, as well as VPOL and VSCH files, are saved to the following directory:
NOTE: Windows Vault can be accessed through the Credential Manager in Windows. Open the Windows Control Panel, choose User Accounts and Family Safety, and then select Credential Manager.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
